story.text: I need to stop letting the weekend drag down my Mondays. Sunday should be a day of rest and I should be in bed by 1030. Spending time with Ben and the Kids should not mean anything different.
Today is another trip to the courthouse - yay. Also, bought a new old truck yesterday. Very excited about that.
Starting to settle into the new job. Really enjoying it and feeling really excited about the future here in the Billings area.
